text: Tamen wen ni fuhuo zai shenme shihou shixian, ni shuo:“Zhiyou wo de zhu zhidao nage shihou, zhiyou ta neng zai yuding de shihou xianshi ta. Ta zai tiandi jian shi zhongda de, ta jiang turan jiang lin nimen.” Tamen wen ni, haoxiang ni duiyu ta shi hen shuxi de, ni shuo:“Zhiyou an la zhidao ta zai shenme shihou shixian, dan zhongren daban bu zhidao 〔zhege daoli〕.”
